# colorWellStyle

**Instance Property**

The appearance and interaction style to apply to the color well.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var colorWellStyle: NSColorWell.Style { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property determines how the color well presents itself, and how interactions affect it. For details, see [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColorWell/Style].

## Configuring the appearance

- **NSColorWell.Style**: Constants that specify the appearance and interaction modes for a color well.
- **image**: The image to display on the button portion of a color well that adopts the expanded style.
- **isBordered**: A Boolean value that determines whether the color well has a border.
